credentials.description: Credentials configuration. Leave `undefined` to disable user/password signups.

oauth.description: OAuth configuration. Leave `undefined` to disable OAuth signups.

clientId.description: The client ID for the OAuth provider.

clientSecret.description: The client secret for the OAuth provider.

issuer.description: The OAuth provider's issuer, if applicable.

secret.description: The JWT secret used to sign tokens.

databaseUrl.description: The URL of the database to connect to.

metadataUrl.description: The public URL of your Stardust instance. Use this if you want to display site metadata.

host.description: The host to connect to, if using an HTTP connection.

network.description: The Docker network used for connecting to containers

port.description: The port for the docker host, if using an HTTP connection.

socket.description: The path to the Docker socket to connect to, if using a socket connection.

type.description: The type of connection to use to connect to the Docker daemon.
